text:
Paradromics | San Jose, CA | Multiple Positions | ONSITE

Paradromics is building the first high-bandwidth brain machine interface. Our technology will enable a new generation of neural prosthetics, with the fundamental goal of changing how neurological conditions are treated.

We are currently looking for talented scientists, engineers and managers to join our team.

Positions: Office Manager and Administrative Assistant to the CEO. R&D Laboratory Scientist. Mechatronics Engineer. Microwire / Microelectrode Engineer. Microfabrication Engineer.

To apply, visit https://paradromics.com/careers/
